name: AVIATION AUSTRALIA PTY LTD
about: Aviation Australia is a world-class registered training organisation, offering professional aviation training across key areas such as aircraft maintenance engineering, cabin crew, pilot, and remote pilot programs. With campuses in Brisbane, Cairns, Melbourne, Perth, and a college in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, we provide industry-focused training using state-of-the-art facilities and equipment. Our courses are designed to balance knowledge, skills, values, and experience, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for employment with strong skills and a thorough understanding of aviation standards. Our passionate instructors have extensive industry experience, and our Student Services team supports students from enrollment to graduation and beyond. We are committed to delivering quality, flexible, and cost-effective accredited aviation training, making us a leading choice for those aspiring to a career in aviation.
services:
["Aircraft Maintenance Engineering
Cabin Crew
